plot: Mitch spends his time trading tall tales with fellow barfly Jordan when he realizes he knows something about Jordan's upcoming wedding that may destroy their new friendship.
title: Straight No Chaser
plot_es: Mitch spends his time trading tall tales with fellow barfly Jordan when he realizes he knows something about Jordan's upcoming wedding that may destroy their new friendship.
